reasoning: The claimant, Daniel Romero, states that he was unable to board his flight on December 14, 2024, due to a medical emergency. He experienced acute abdominal pain the night before the flight and was admitted to a hospital. The policy covers "Trip Cancellation or Rescheduling" due to a "Medical emergency (must be supported by a medical report)". Mr. Romero has provided a "hospital admission document.png" which serves as the medical report supporting his claim of a medical emergency. The flight details confirm a no-show for the flight on December 14, 2024. Therefore, the claim aligns with the covered reasons and documentation requirements of the policy.
